Just let me know what email you <a href="http://my.frantech.ca/register.php" target="_blank">signed up</a> with, and which plan you'd like. Casualties Friday ends this afternoon, around 1800h GMT-5.  I'll keep the availability count here updated throughout the day.

Any LET member is welcome to request a plan;  you do not have to be a current client of ours.  As manual orders does bypass the standard methods, please be sure to read the following documentation:
